title: Drawing, "Design for Textile with All-over Small Floral Pattern and Color Block Notations"
inscribed: Inscribed at bottom vertically in [?], list in French of 11 color blocks to be used in design
description: Small cluster of flowers in brown with red and pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile with All-over Small Floral Pattern and Color Block Notations".
Gouache on hand-made wove paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-393.
